sub_concepts.name: Contour Lines
sub_concepts.definition: Lines on a map connecting points of equal elevation

sub_concepts.name: Scale
sub_concepts.definition: Ratio of distance on the map to actual distance on the ground

sub_concepts.name: Legend
sub_concepts.definition: Key providing information on symbols used in the map

sub_concepts.name: Topographic Profiles
sub_concepts.definition: Cross-sectional view of the terrain along a specific line

sub_concepts.name: Relief
sub_concepts.definition: Representation of the height and depth of terrain features
